title: anyone else think the mastery, Natural Talent is completely useless?
body: Natural Talent gives you 2 ad and 3 ap at lvl 18 that seems completely useless.

replies.body: Thats not it at all. if you put all 5 points it gives you 10 AD and 15 ap.
Oh wow 10AD and 15 AP now I am definitely going to use it.  {{sticker:slayer-jinx-unamused}}
Well if you're an ap mage with only aoe damage, it's better than vampirism.
+3 attack dmg and +3 ap at level 2 is not that bad, do more dmg to laner and minions easier farm better poke.
It;s not "Amazing", but neither is the other choice it's paired with, so it's fine
As someone pointed out it's actually 10ad and 15 ap, but still that's useless.
